panel.upscaleAllLikedTooltip: Upscale videos from multiple liked posts

prompt.toTooltip: Replace current prompt with this one
prompt.fromTooltip: Save current prompt to this slot
prompt.makeTooltip: Fill prompt and click Make button

status.navigateToPost: Navigate to a post to manage prompts

prompt.previousTooltip: Previous prompt (Left arrow, hold for fast navigation)
prompt.nextTooltip: Next prompt (Right arrow, hold for fast navigation)
prompt.makeAndNextTooltip: Make video and navigate to next post
prompt.autoMakeNextTooltip: Auto: Automatically repeat Make + Next with 1-1.5s delay

settings.listLimitWarning: Warning: Using limits different from 100 might lead to a ban

tooltips.packsManagement: Manage packs: import/export, rename, organize prompts with drag & drop
tooltips.rememberPostState: Remember which prompt pack was used for each post, automatically switching packs when navigating between posts
tooltips.simpleShortcut: Use Ctrl/Cmd+Enter instead of Ctrl/Cmd+Shift+Enter to apply prompt
tooltips.confirmCopyFrom: Show confirmation dialog when copying from page would replace existing prompt text
tooltips.globalPromptAddon: Add custom text that will be automatically appended to every prompt when pressing Make or Make+Next
tooltips.autoDownload: Automatically download media files when video generation completes
tooltips.enableSound: Enable sound effects for UI interactions
tooltips.hideUnsave: Hide the Unsave button from the page
tooltips.enableThePit: Show The Pit tab for accessing deleted posts
tooltips.collapseSections: Enable collapsible sections - sections start collapsed and can be expanded by clicking headers. When off, all sections are always expanded

tooltips.upscaleAllLiked: Upscale videos from multiple liked posts
tooltips.downloadAllLiked: Download all media from multiple liked posts
tooltips.manageLikes: Unlike posts or re-like from archive

about.description: Chrome/Firefox extension for Grok media management
about.author: by b2kdaman

features.savePrompts: Save and organize prompts in packs
features.themes: Multiple color themes and UI sizes
features.saveOrganize: Save and organize prompts with packs
features.packManagement: Create, delete, and switch between packs
features.importExportPacks: Import and export packs (add or replace mode)
features.aiGenerate: Generate new packs with AI using Grok prompt templates
features.downloadMedia: Download images and videos (when all videos are HD)
features.parallelUpscale: Parallel video upscaling to HD quality
features.bulkOperations: Bulk operations: Delete, upscale, relike, unlike posts
features.purgeData: Purge all data feature for complete data cleanup
features.batchSelection: Shift-click batch selection in bulk operations modal
features.makeNext: Make + Next: Automate prompt application and post navigation
features.themeCustomization: Theme customization (Dark, Light, Dracula, Winamp, LimeWire, Steam, Discord)

help.aboutText: ImagineGodMode helps you manage video generation prompts with features like saving prompt packs, rating, importing/exporting, upscaling videos to HD, and auto-downloading media.

tooltips.crossBrowser: Works seamlessly on both Firefox and Chrome browsers
tooltips.saveOrganize: Create multiple packs to organize your prompts by theme or project
tooltips.packManagement: Add new packs, delete existing ones, and easily switch between them
tooltips.ratePrompts: Click stars to rate your prompts from 1-5 stars for easy quality tracking
tooltips.arrowKeys: Use left/right arrow keys to quickly browse through videos
tooltips.navigatePostsWithArrows: Use arrow keys to navigate between posts instead of videos (by default, arrow keys navigate videos)
tooltips.importExport: Share packs with others or backup your prompts as JSON files
tooltips.aiGenerate: Use Grok AI to generate entire prompt packs from templates
tooltips.downloadMedia: Automatically download all images and HD videos from a post
tooltips.parallelUpscale: Upscale multiple videos to HD quality simultaneously for faster processing
tooltips.bulkOperations: Perform delete, upscale, relike, or unlike actions on multiple posts at once
tooltips.purgeData: Completely wipe all extension data with a secure confirmation sequence
tooltips.batchSelection: Hold Shift and click to select multiple items in bulk operations
tooltips.makeNext: Automatically apply prompt and navigate to next post in sequence
tooltips.realtimeProgress: See live progress bar while videos are generating
tooltips.playPause: Control video playback with play/pause button or spacebar
tooltips.fullscreen: Watch videos in fullscreen mode by pressing F or clicking the button
tooltips.hideUnsave: Remove the unsave button from the UI for cleaner interface
tooltips.themeCustomization: Choose from 7 different themes to match your style
tooltips.uiScaling: Scale the entire UI from 70% (Tiny) to 115% (Large)
tooltips.autoDownloadMedia: Enable automatic downloads when video generation completes
tooltips.multiLanguage: Switch between English, Spanish, Russian, and German languages

purge.allPromptPacksDesc: Every pack and prompt will be deleted
